title: Introducing: The Medicine Hat
body:
Really digging these two first two tracks from Ontario five piece (Michael, Elliott, Chris, Nabi and Tyler) **The Medicine Hat**.

There’s an almost Fleetwood Mac quality to the songwriting, set against some high energy production – it’s the right side of pop and the right sort of anthemic. Check out _St. Cecillia_ and _New Survival_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
